md:
giải nghĩa từ "desiring" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

**Desiring** (verb)

* Meaning: wanting or wishing for something
* Vietnamese: mong muốn, khát khao

Example sentence: She has been desiring a new car for years.

* Related words: desire, wish, long, yearn
* Antonyms: disliking, hating, loathing

**Desiring** (adjective)

* Meaning: having a strong wish or desire for something
* Vietnamese: khát khao, mong muốn

Example sentence: He is a desiring student who always wants to learn more.

* Related words: eager, enthusiastic, passionate
* Antonyms: disinterested, unenthusiastic, apathetic
html:

Desiring (verb)

  • Vietnamese: mong muốn, khát khao

Example sentence: She has been desiring a new car for years.

  • Related words: desire, wish, long, yearn
  • Antonyms: disliking, hating, loathing

Desiring (adjective)

  • Meaning: having a strong wish or desire for something
  • Vietnamese: khát khao, mong muốn

Example sentence: He is a desiring student who always wants to learn more.

  • Related words: eager, enthusiastic, passionate
  • Antonyms: disinterested, unenthusiastic, apathetic
